{"rule":"SI_UNITS_OF_MEASURMENT_ADJECTIVES_PLURAL","sentence":"^\\Qhigher min-DF: not effective, \"man_big\" appears for more than 10 times\nno stop-words: not effective, lots of meaningless results\nnew logic: consider stop-words, but only include 2-grams whose components are also adjacent in the original text\nexample: \"The extremely talented student gave a brilliant presentation.\"\nstop-words here includes: the, a\nold logic generates 2-grams:\nextremely_talented\ntalented_student\nstudent_gave\ngave_brilliant\nbrilliant_presentation\\E$"}
